ovdesc.p: Application to hold the Classification details for a customer, and to manually input a Classification for that customer.
When CUSTOMER level is opted in PV.MANAGEMENT, PV.CUSTOMER.DETAIL is updated. Based on the classification of each asset under the customer, worst classification is identified and held here.
New record can be created only by the job PV.CLASSIFICATION. Manual amendment can be done to the record. 'H' type file, so that it can keep track of manual changes to the record.
$HIS will be maintained only for the manual changes.
